thanks_for_registration: Thanks for your registration in MT Coding
we_need_to_verify: We need to verify your email address.
after_verification: After the verification is done, please follow our guideline to set up your confessor profile.
tfd_right: Teaching For Development, All Rights Reserved.
you_are_receiving_this_email: You are receiving this email because you registered in MT Coding platform. If you did not register, and you believe someone may use this email without your consent, please just ignore it.
we_received_request_to_reset_password: We received your request to reset your password. If you didn't perform such action and believed that someone might do it on your behalf, please ignore this email.
